name: Cosmic Strike
description:
Fast paced arcade style side-scrolling shooter focused on beating the own highscore in a short session.

Shoot down the invading flying saucers with your laser while trying to avoid being hit. Your energy shield can protect you from enemy shots or a crash.

Keep an eye on your energy bar and use the crank to charge it. Every laser shot or hit will reduce your energy level. Happy cranking!
